ItemTooltip.StrangeBrew:
Dapat Menimbulkan Efek Samping Berikut:
-Penyembuhan Tak Menentu
-Potion Sickness Inkonsisten
-[Brief Periods of Inexplicable Invulnerability]
'It looks dan smells terrible'
ItemTooltip.GlowPaint:
Fully illuminates the coated object
Can be combined with any other paint or coating
'What a bright idea!'
ItemTooltip.EchoCoating:
Membuat obyek yang dilapis hanya terlihat dengan Echo Sight
Dapat dikombinasi dengan paint atau coating lainnya
'It's all clear to me now.'
ItemTooltip.TreeGlobe:
Lempar untuk mengubah penampilan pohon!
'Time for a change of scenery'
ItemTooltip.WorldGlobe:
Lempar untuk mengubah penampilan dunia!
'Time for a change of scenery'
ItemTooltip.MoonGlobe:
Lempar untuk mengubah penampilan bulan!
'Time for a change of scenery'
ItemTooltip.ChumBucket:
Lempar ke air sampai 3 kali untuk meningkatkan fishing power
'Plankton!'
ItemTooltip.ArtisanLoaf:
[Consume] untuk meningkatkan jangkauan [crafting station] secara permanen
'Legendary Bread that once reminded Teddy of home'
ItemTooltip.MinecartPowerup:
Memberikan peningkatan kecepatan dan laser untuk minecart
'Free Mechanical Cart included!'
ItemTooltip.StickyBomb:
A small explosion that will destroy most tiles
'Tossing may be difficult.'
ItemTooltip.StickyDynamite:
A large explosion that will destroy most tiles
'Tossing may be difficult.'
ItemTooltip.StickyGrenade:
A small explosion that will not destroy tiles
'Tossing may be difficult.'
ItemTooltip.BouncyDynamite:
A large explosion that will destroy most tiles
'This will prove to be a terrible idea'
ItemTooltip.PotionOfReturn:
Teleports you home and creates a portal
Use portal to return when you are done
'Good for one round trip!'
ItemTooltip.BloodMoonStarter:
Summons the Blood Moon
'What a horrible night to have a curse.'
ItemTooltip.DaoofPow:
Dapat menimbulkan confusion
'Find your inner pieces'
ItemTooltip.TentacleSpike:
Menancapkan duri kepada musuh
'Never grab the pointy end.'
ItemTooltip.HamBat:
Grows more powerful the better fed you are
Defeating enemies temporarily improves healing
'TIS A WEAPON O' PIG BUTT!'
ItemTooltip.BatBat:
Serangan memulihkan 1 health
'Maybe I could bat some bats with this.'
ItemTooltip.PewMaticHorn:
Mengubah peluru menjadi barang-barang acak
'ALLOWS WIRELESS TRANSFER OF INJURY!'
ItemTooltip.BloodRainBow:
Menghujani darah dari langit
'Reign in Blood'
ItemTooltip.WeatherPain:
Mengabaikan 10 point Defense musuh
'What a pane... heh'
ItemTooltip.StardustCellStaff:
Summons a stardust cell to fight for you
'Cultivate the most beautiful cellular infection'
ItemTooltip.StardustDragonStaff:
Summons a stardust dragon to fight for you
'Who needs a horde of minions when you have a giant dragon?'
ItemTooltip.BoneWhip:
7 summon tag damage
{$CommonItemTooltip.Whips}
Performs better against multiple targets than most whips
'This goes to eleven'
ItemTooltip.CoolWhip:
6 summon tag damage
{$CommonItemTooltip.Whips}
Strike enemies to summon a friendly snowflake
'Let me have some of that cool whip'
ItemTooltip.GravediggerShovel:
Digs in a bigger area than a pickaxe
Only digs up soft tiles
'Can you dig it?'
ItemTooltip.RubblemakerSmall:
Used with materials to place matching rubble
<right> to toggle placement size
Press Up/Down to cycle through styles
'Not a piledriver nor a placeinator: It's a Rubblemaker'
ItemTooltip.RubblemakerMedium:
Used with materials to place matching rubble
<right> to toggle placement size
Press Up/Down to cycle through styles
'Not a piledriver nor a placeinator: It's a Rubblemaker'
ItemTooltip.RubblemakerLarge:
Used with materials to place matching rubble
<right> to toggle placement size
Press Up/Down to cycle through styles
'Not a piledriver nor a placeinator: It's a Rubblemaker'
ItemTooltip.MoonLordLegs:
Slightly increases mobility
'These might be Steve's'
ItemTooltip.UltrabrightHelmet:
Improves vision and provides light when worn
'The darkness holds no secrets for you'
ItemTooltip.SandBoots:
The wearer can run super fast, and even faster on sand
'Walk without rhythm and you won't attract the worm'
ItemTooltip.AncientChisel:
Increases mining speed by 25%
'Ancient problems require ancient solutions'
ItemTooltip.BoneHelm:
Summons shadow hands to attack your foes
'I've got a headache just looking at it.'
ItemTooltip.Magiluminescence:
Meningkatkan kecepatan gerak dan akselerasi
Memberikan cahaya ketika dikenakan
'A brief light in my dark life.'
ItemTooltip.LuckyCoin:
Musuh terkadang menjatuhkan koin saat diserang
'I found a coin! It's my lucky day!'
ItemTooltip.DontStarveShaderItem:
Allows the user to see the world differently
'Forbidden Knowledge echoes from the radio...'
ItemTooltip.JimsDrone:
Rotate Left/Right to steer & Press Up to accelerate
'First rule of Flight Club, we don't talk about Flight Club'
ItemTooltip.JimsDroneVisor:
Memungkinkan pemakainya melihat melalui kamera drone-nya
'Chonky Fishron RC Systems'
ItemTooltip.FishMinecart:
Tidak diperlambat oleh air
'Deal with it'
ItemTooltip.ThinIce:
Breaks when fallen on
'Watch your step'
ItemTooltip.Grate:
Cairan dapat melaluinya
Dapat dibuka dan ditutup menggunakan kabel
'They'rrrre great!'
ItemTooltip.TeleportationPylonVictory:
Teleport ke pylon lainnya
Dapat berfungsi di mana saja
'You must construct additional pylons'
ItemTooltip.StinkbugHousingBlocker:
When placed in a home, prevents villagers from moving in
'Smells like cilantro'
ItemTooltip.StinkbugHousingBlockerEcho:
When placed in a home, prevents villagers from moving in
Only visible with Echo Sight
'Smells like expired cilantro'
ItemTooltip.ShimmerMonolith:
'Witness a glimpse of the Aether's power.'
Can be used to manifest or suppress the Aether
ItemTooltip.IvyGuitar:
Playable Instrument
'Property of Dead Man's Sweater'
ItemTooltip.DrumStick:
Playable next to Drum Set
'The coffee is strong...and vulgar'
ItemTooltip.PortalGun:
Membuat sepasang portal yang dapat dilewati.
<left> & <right> untuk memasang portal.
Meningkatkan momentum dan kecepatan jatuh selama dipegang.
'Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out.'
ItemTooltip.VoidLens:
Memanggil void vault
Berfungsi sebagai inventory tambahan ketika dibuka
Selama terbuka, item akan masuk ke dalamnya jika inventory sudah penuh
{$CommonItemTooltip.RightClickToClose}
'This pocket dimension is out of this world!'
ItemTooltip.ClosedVoidBag:
Memanggil void vault
Berfungsi sebagai inventory tambahan ketika dibuka
Selama terbuka, item akan masuk ke dalamnya jika inventory sudah penuh
{$CommonItemTooltip.RightClickToOpen}
'This pocket dimension is out of this world!'
